About Me

Hi! My name is Mohazza, and I'm a passionate game designer/programmer. I have been learning game development, (specificly Unity game engine) for the past 4 years. I have done both solo development, and worked in small teams. Being a solo developer, I had to learn a wide variety of skills and dive into all the aspects of making a video games. That's how I ended up having a rich experience in building games from art (3D modeling and animation) to programming. I also have experience in web devolopement including both Front-end and Back-end development. Finally, I run a YouTube channel where I upload Unity tutorials and devlogs.
